overview: Director Max Hancock returns with his second take on the raw intimacy of man-on-man sex. A trio of hot one-on-ones, all of which compliment his work in the original Bareback Bedroom. Each scene has a unique flavor, accented by the type of guys. Whether it's two big-dicked sexpigs, a duo of muscle men, or a couple of horse-hung alternative types, Hancock again captures the essence or what real men having real sex looks and feels like.
title: Bareback Bedroom 2
